content.raw:
ok just tried this, it moves the first `<gravity>` tag out from `<physics>` but not the second one. so it still produces the msg:

~~~
XML Element[gravity], child of element[physics] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[gravity]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
~~~

Now that `<gravity>` is in `<world>`, does it mean we cannot have multiple gravity presets?
content.html:
ok just tried this, it moves the first <gravity> tag out from <physics> but not the second one. so it still produces the msg:

XML Element[gravity], child of element[physics] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[gravity]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.

Now that <gravity> is in <world>, does it mean we cannot have multiple gravity presets?
